collectible.title: Cocogoat Milk
collectible.subtitle: The finest milk in all of Liyue.
collectible.text: A special type of milk. It seems that Qiqi particularly enjoys this type of milk, and commonly soughts after it...
collectible.unlock: Win against Ganyu in her breed form. EXTRA HINT: Play a game with a character with the 'Dominant' tag, or play with the name 'Master', "Lord' or 'Mistress'.

collectible.title: Qingxin Flower
collectible.subtitle: A beautiful flower from Liyue, and also Ganyu's favorite mid-time snack.
collectible.text: "Qingxin grow on the mountaintops and peaks throughout Liyue; many can notably be found in Minlin and Wuwang Hill." -- A bitter delight that Ganyu enjoys snacking on.
collectible.unlock: Win against Ganyu in her non-horny mode.
